identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Music, Theater and Dance

block.p: LEAD: The trio of Robert Dick on flute, Mark Dresser on bass, and Gerry Hemingway on percussion is to perform Sunday at 8 P.M. at the Knitting Factory, 47 East Houston Street (219-3055). At 10 P.M., the trio of Wilber Morris on bass, Claude Lawrence on saxophone, and Dennis Charles on drums is to perform.

LEAD: The trio of Robert Dick on flute, Mark Dresser on bass, and Gerry Hemingway on percussion is to perform Sunday at 8 P.M. at the Knitting Factory, 47 East Houston Street (219-3055). At 10 P.M., the trio of Wilber Morris on bass, Claude Lawrence on saxophone, and Dennis Charles on drums is to perform.

The trio of Robert Dick on flute, Mark Dresser on bass, and Gerry Hemingway on percussion is to perform Sunday at 8 P.M. at the Knitting Factory, 47 East Houston Street (219-3055). At 10 P.M., the trio of Wilber Morris on bass, Claude Lawrence on saxophone, and Dennis Charles on drums is to perform. Tickets are $5.
